title: British Virgin Islands telephone area code
description: Area code  284 is the telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan (NANP) for the British Virgin Islands (BVI). The area code was established on October  1,  1997, following a split from area code  809. A permissive dialing period lasted until September  30,  1998. Local calls within the BVI require seven digits, while calls from other NANP countries to the BVI use the dialing sequence  1 NPA-XXX-XXXX, with  1 being the NANP trunk access code.
notes: The  284 area code has been associated with a form of telephone fraud known as the 'one ring scam'. This scam involves the perpetrator calling the victim using a robodialer and hanging up when answered, hoping the victim will call back. If the victim does so, they are charged an automatic $19.95 international call fee plus $9.00 per minute thereafter.
